description: Harvested from the blood of the legendary Hydra of Greek myth, whose very blood was poisonous. This virulent green toxin deals 10d6 poison damage on a failed CON save (DC 18) and prevents healing for 1 minute. Hercules dipped his arrows in hydra blood to make them deadlier.
effect: A creature takes 3d6 poison damage on a failed CON save.
name: Toxin of the Hydra
